alert.note: Alert for Butler; Franklin (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 6:35PM CDT until April 04 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Franklin County in north central Iowa... Butler County in north central Iowa... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 635 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southwest of Dumont, or 10 miles southeast of Hampton, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Dumont around 640 PM CDT. Bristow and Aredale around 645 PM CDT. Allison and Allison Municipal Airport around 650 PM CDT. Greene around 655 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
